column6: CURSE OF THE MUTANTS PART 2 Upon discovering that San Francisco has been invaded by Dracula and his vampire army, the X-Men set out to find the evil and destroy it. But when Blade the Vampire Slayer shows up, things take a turn for the worse.
column8: | writer:Victor Gischler | colorist:Marte Gracia | penciller:Adi Granov | penciller:Paco Medina | inker:JUAN FRANCISCO VELASCO
